title: IIT alumni to invest Rs 700 cr for EV buses in Goa; will revive mass transport, says CM Pramod Sawant
description: The Goa cabinet has approved a proposal by IIT alumni to invest Rs 700 crore in introducing electric buses for the state's public transport system. The initiative aims to roll out 500 EV buses, enhancing the fleet of Kadamba Transport Corporation Limited and reviving non-operational routes and interstate services.
